data.title: Why was Madonna cameo not credited on die another day?
data.meta_description: Answers is the place to go to get the answers you need and to ask the questions you want
data.text:
How many songs has Madonna made?

* A Certain Sacrifice (1979) * Vision Quest (cameo appearance) (1985) * Desperately Seeking Susan (1985) * Shanghai Surprise (1986) * Who's That Girl (1987) * Bloodhounds Of Broadway (1989) * Dick Tracy (1990) * Truth or Dare (aka In Bed With Madonna) (1991) * Shadows & Fog (cameo appearance) (1992) * A League Of Their Own (1992) * Body Of Evidence (1993) * Dangerous Games (aka Snake Eyes) (1993) * Four Rooms (1995) * Blue in the Face (cameo) (1995) * Girl 6 (1996) * Evita (1996) * The Next Best Thing (2000) * Swept Away (2002) * Die Another Day (2002) * I'm Going To Tell You A Secret (2005) * Arthur and the Minimoys (voice) (2006)

What does Madonna believe in?

Madonna was raised as a Catholic in the Christian religion. in the mid-late 90's she discovered the religion Kabbalah and she to this day still believes in it and follows it. if you see her wrist you will notice a piece of red string- this is part of kabbalah religion.
